title: Benog Wildlife Sanctuary
review: Benog Wildlife Sanctuary is the located in mussorie about 10km from library point. Visitors can reach by there with private buses. Kids enjoy there to watch the birds, animals like panther, bear etc.

title: Great
review: "Around 11 km from Library Point, the Benog Wildlife Sanctuary is a part of the popular Rajaji National Park. Home to a

title: good but nothing special
review: 10 km from library chowk. and was very hot day in june. we could not enjoy much.you can see many birds. good place for trekking but in cold day.

title: Interesting Experience
review: The Sanctuary serves as a home to many endangered and rare species of avifauna.Apart from fauna,herds of deer and leopards are also spotted in their natural habitat.Beautiful views of snow peaks like Chaukhamba and Bandar Punch can be seen from this Sanctuary.

title: Nice Place
review: 10 km from library chowk. and was very hot day in june. yet we enjoy so much.you can see many birds. good place for trekking.

title: Forest Trail to Benog Hill
review: Benog Wildlife Sanctuary is the best nature forest walk and day trek in the Mussoorie region. The forest walk to Benog Wildlife Sanctuary starts from Clouds End. This scenic nature trail starts as a jungle walk giving slendid forest views which further takes you to the Benog Hill peak which at 2,250 m is the highest mountain peak in Mussoorie region. It is suitable for people of all age groups & fitness level. Benog Hill is a must visit place for nature lovers, hikers, photographers and adventure seekers !

title: Bird photography
review: The road takes you till the gate of reserve post which you have to walk for 7-8 kilometers to reach Benog. On the way you see some nice stream creating small waterfalls. Trail is green and scenic. Hoped to see some birds but being noon there weren't many. Go there if looking for solidarity peace and quite atmosphere.

title: Awesome
review: A nice conservatory sanctuary full of those who needs protection against some humans, nice and clean surroundings

title: Brilliant location for birding.
review: Brilliant location for birding, and day hikes. We went with a group of six and had a wonderful time on the gentle slopes, the abandoned brewery and local temples near by.

title: nice walk!
review: It is nice to walk to the top of Binog but you shoud have a guide, if not you are lost....;-) the view is fantastic!

title: Nice
review: Wildlife sanctuary is good. But i visited a lot of sanctuary that's why did not like this too much.

title: Fine Place To Visit
review: Benog Wildlife Sanctuary is really nice if you have enough time to visit it. There are many tourist places in mussoorie which are more popular then this. But if you like peace and quite places this is one of them.

title: Nice place
review: This is a nice place with lots of natural beauty around. Not far away from main mussoorie, it's a beautiful place to enjoy.

title: birds..birds..birds
review: nothing much to offer.. different species of birds... natures lover delight..  mussoories has many other offerings

title: good
review: this is worth visiting place. i visited the place once and i liked it. this is good place for one time only

title: Nature at its best
review: this is where nature lovers should be. Beautiful hills,forest and a paradise for bird watchers. Venture into the forest on your own or in groups, hikers, trekers should enjoy it !

title: Rajaji national park
review: Commonly known as rajaji national park, you cross through while driving from haridwar to dehradun. Taking a day trip is a good option. Birds and deers is what you get to see.

title: Waste of time and money
review: You will not find any tiger in the reserve nor any elephants in their respective zones. I have spotted only a cow and a monkey in the whole forest with some different kinds of birds. The forest however is dense and its a treat to watch trees growing close together forming a jungle

title: Not good
review: Average place as could not spot many birds .Otherwise place is good for trekking and enjoying great views

title: Commonly known as Rajaji National park
review: Being a national park one can except to see some wild animals but our luck is not much good we cant see any wild animal but enjoy the natures beauty. forest is very dense. nature is it best. can go when have spare time of 4-6 hrs

title: A trek not a wildlife sanctuary
review: Its a long walk from LIbrary point (4 hours each way) or else go to Hathi Paon and then its a 3-4 hour round trip.  Nice gradual incline on the trek, not too tiring. But did not see any birds or animals of note (except some langurs)

title: amazing
review: this is amazing and thrilling wildlife sanctuary

title: bird lovers paradise
review: if you want to begin your journey to the himalayas you must try this binog hill located west of mussoorie i had a super experience in my life that i did that 25 years ago

title: Excellent Place for Wildlife Photographers
review: This is an excellent place for Wildlife photographers as you can find lot many species of Birds in this sanctuary. An ideal place to spend some quality time with nature.

title: Nature's Delight
review: Its  Great For Bird Watching Its One Of The  Beautiful  Sanctuary Which   Tour Can Be Done By Trekking Its A Birders Delight In Lap Of Nature
